title: Robinhood Brings DeFi to Users, Adds 200+ Ethereum and Polygon Tokens
description: The Robinhood Wallet now supports Ethereum and Polygon DeFi, along with the ability to transfer Bitcoin and Dogecoin to other wallets.

title: Instadapp Introduces Avocado Multisig Wallet
description: One of the distinct features of this wallet is its capability to use a single address on more than ten different blockchain networks.

title: Bitcoin Miner Iris Energy Dives into Generative AI, Investing $10M in Nvidia GPUs Amidst Soaring Demand
description: On August 29, the publicly traded bitcoin mining entity, Iris Energy, revealed its acquisition of 248 Nvidia H100 graphics processing units (GPUs) at a cost of $10 million. While the company emphasized that its primary focus remains on BTC mining, it views generative artificial intelligence (AI) as an enticing “additional opportunity.” From Bitcoin Mining ASICs […]

title: Grayscale CEO  unsure about a spot bitcoin ETF refiling despite a “huge win” against SEC
description: Grayscale Investments CEO, Michael Sonnenshein, has expressed uncertainty about whether the company needs to refile its application with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to convert its GBTC product into a spot bitcoin ETF, even after a recent favorable court decision. The US appeals court recently overturned the SEC’s rejection of Grayscale’s proposed ... Read more
